targets.expr: {compose_service="trading-brain"} | json | line_format "{{.level | ToUpper}} [{{.event}}]{{if .summary}} {{.summary}}{{end}}{{if .portfolio}} portfolio={{.portfolio}}{{end}}{{if .symbols}} symbols={{.symbols}}{{end}}{{if .signals}} signals={{.signals}}{{end}}{{if .pairs}} pairs={{.pairs}}{{end}}{{if .mode}} mode={{.mode}}{{end}}{{if .error}} error={{.error}}{{end}}"
